law.catch_line: A member of a lawyer counseling committee, defined under § 10-502 of the Business Occupations and P...
law.text:
A member of a lawyer counseling committee, defined under § 10-502 of the Business Occupations and Professions Article, who acts in good faith and within the scope of the jurisdiction of the committee is not civilly liable or subject to a disciplinary proceeding for:
An action as a member of the committee; or
Giving information to, participating in, or contributing to the functioning of the committee.
